ajxpdriver.name: smb
ajxpdriver.label: Samba
ajxpdriver.description: Access a samba share. Based on a PHP wrapper around the command-line smbclient tool.

param.name: HOST
param.label: Host
param.description: Full path to the Samba Share without trailing slash. Can contain user:password too.

param.name: PATH
param.label: Uri
param.description: Path to the root folder on the server

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: File Creation Mask
param.description: Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.
